request.description:
| **URL** | **/users/:id** |
| --- | --- |
| Method | GET |

- Success Response :
    - Status Code : 200 OK
    - Response Body :

``` json
[
    {
        "name": "test",
        "email": "test@test.com"
    }
]

```

- Error Response :
    - Status Code : 404 NOT FOUND

``` json
{
    "message": "User not Found"
}

```

- Error Response :
    - Status Code : 400 BAD REQUEST

``` json
{
    "message": "Invalid user ID"
}

```

- Error Response
    - Status Code : 403 Forbidden
    - Response Body :

``` json
{
    "message" : "Access Denied"
}

```

| **URL** | **/projects** |
| --- | --- |
| Method | GET |

- Success Response :

``` json

    {
        "_id": "64560c79aa98c1cfc48462ff",
        "name": "Project 1",
        "description": "This is a new project",
        "due_date": "2023-12-31T00:00:00.000Z",
        "user_id": "645603d7cce517ec731173a4",
        "tasks": [
            "6456116b5e0437d0e300b52e",
            "64562e285951e53b41df9cdc"
        ],
        "__v": 0
    }
]

```

- Error Response :
    - Status Code : 404 NOT FOUND

``` json
{
    "message": "Project is Empty"
}

```
